page.title: 02Mollington Village (General)
page.content: The West side contains most of the older properties,being constructed extensively on the local mellow yellow Hornton stone.This stone is much favoured in all the surrounding villages being used on most new property to conform to the "environment". The village lies on the South West facing slope of the Valley with splendid open views across to Edge Hill which creates magnificent sunsets on most evenings during Summer. There has been considerable building in the village over the last 50 years,with small pockets of high quality private houses,in between the old original buildings.Several of the original Farms land have been sold of for house building leaving the large Farmhouses standing amidst the new properties.
